tasks.title: Develop SPA Architecture
tasks.description: Designing the component structure and integrating Ant Design for the core layout.

tasks.title: Form Setup and Validation
tasks.description: Implement complex forms using Antd Form components and custom validation rules.

tasks.title: SQL Query Optimization
tasks.description: Perform an audit of slow PostgreSQL database queries and add necessary indexes.

tasks.title: Shopping Cart Bug Fix
tasks.description: The price calculation is incorrect when adding more than 10 items to the cart.

tasks.title: Home Page Redesign
tasks.description: Update the color palette and typography according to the new brand book.

tasks.title: Unit Test Implementation
tasks.description: Cover core API controllers with unit tests using Jest/Supertest.

tasks.title: Payment Gateway Integration
tasks.description: Connect Stripe API for card processing and recurring payments.

tasks.title: CI/CD Pipeline Configuration
tasks.description: Automate deployment to staging environment via GitHub Actions.

tasks.title: Analytics Module Requirements
tasks.description: Conduct a stakeholder meeting and draft the technical specification.

tasks.title: API Documentation Update
tasks.description: Add descriptions for new endpoints and schema updates in Swagger/OpenAPI.

tasks.title: Auth System Refactoring
tasks.description: Migrate from session-based authentication to JWT tokens with refresh cycles.

tasks.title: Mobile Menu Responsive Fix
tasks.description: Fix element overlap on screens smaller than 360px width.

tasks.title: Migration to Ant Design 5.0
tasks.description: Update packages and rewrite custom styles to fit the new design system.

tasks.title: Logo Concept Creation
tasks.description: Prepare three vector concepts for the new service logo.

tasks.title: Security Pentest Audit
tasks.description: Scan the application for XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: Sentry Error Monitoring
tasks.description: Integrate real-time frontend error tracking and logging.

tasks.title: Dark Mode Implementation
tasks.description: Implement a theme switcher with persistent storage in localStorage.

tasks.title: App Localization (i18n)
tasks.description: Add support for English and German languages using react-i18next.

tasks.title: Server Log Cleanup
tasks.description: Clear the /var/log directory of files older than 30 days.

tasks.title: Quarterly Performance Report
tasks.description: Gather statistics on completed tasks and team KPI metrics.
